en.We've received your order and will conta: We've received your order and will contact you as soon as your package is shipped.
en.You can find your purchase information b: You can find your purchase information below.
en.If you have any questions, reply to this: If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at

fr.We've received your order and will conta: Nous avons bien reçu votre commande et vous contacterons dès que votre colis sera expédié.
fr.You can find your purchase information b: Vous pouvez trouver vos informations d'achat ci-dessous.
fr.If you have any questions, reply to this: Si vous avez des questions, répondez à cet e-mail ou contactez-nous à

de.We've received your order and will conta: Wir haben Ihre Bestellung erhalten und werden Sie kontaktieren, sobald Ihr Paket versendet wird.
de.If you have any questions, reply to this: Wenn Sie Fragen haben, antworten Sie auf diese E-Mail oder kontaktieren Sie uns unter
